value:
Have I become stronger? I want to be
able to do more than just defend
myself. I want to protect others.

Though I never wished it, constant
battle has honed my skill. Of course,
I'm no match for Ephraim or Seth.

You're an unusual person. I perceive
something new about you every day.$k$pLooking at you is like looking at a
star. The light is constant, but ever
changing.

What a remarkable book you have
there. Would you be so kind as to
let me take a look at it?

Attitude helps, and form is crucial,
but when push comes to shove,
practical experience matters most.$k$pDo you think we might spar later?
I could use some practice.

You must be $Nu,
$Nf's comrade.

Do not fret. No enemy will reach you
as long as I am here!

I am not living up to my potential. I
must train more.
Stronger. I need to get stronger.

Thank you. With power like this, I
am sure to win.

I am princess Eirika of Renais. I will
do my utmost to protect you and
to never sully the title of Hero.

Do you mind resting here for a
moment, $Nu?$k$pAfter these past days of battle, you
must be exhausted. Close your eyes...
Feel peace.$k$pI...do not like fighting. I do not like to
see people get hurt. But wishing and
hoping rarely bring results...$k$pI learned that I can only protect what
is important to me with my own
power, and I swore to become strong.$k$pI think you understand what I mean.
Don't you, $Nu?$k$pI thank you for your thoughts and for
this time. Let's stay here a little while
longer, shall we?
ええいっ！
参ります！
きゃああっ！
いけません…
Now, my path is clear!
Face me!
I must meet this head-on!
No time for hesitation!
Brother, I...
うふふ
I am princess Eirika of Renais. What's that you called me? Legendary Hero?
Ooh! Why must you be so...
I was once weak, and I understood nothing. But as a princess, I must change.
Even after the fighting has ended... I want to do all I can to bring joy to the hearts of my people.
I know so little about the world. Would you mind very much if I asked you to teach me?
The ability to overcome sorrow... That is a kind of strength, isn't it?
Now and forever, let me stand by your side.
Yes.
Let me aid you.
Counsel me.
